+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+       
+       &lt;!-- ä¸‹éƒ¨æ“ä½œã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ --&gt;
+       &lt;div class="dialog-footer"&gt;
+         &lt;a href="#" @click.prevent="closeDialog" class="close-link"&gt;é–‰ã˜ã‚‹&lt;/a&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+       
+       &lt;!-- ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°è¡¨ç¤º --&gt;
+       &lt;div v-if="loading" class="loading-overlay"&gt;
+         &lt;div class="loading-spinner"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;p&gt;å‡¦ç†ä¸­...&lt;/p&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+       
+       &lt;!-- ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚° --&gt;
+       &lt;div v-if="showErrorDialog" class="error-dialog-overlay" @click.self="closeErrorDialog"&gt;
+         &lt;div class="error-dialog-container"&gt;
+           &lt;div class="error-dialog-header"&gt;
+             &lt;span class="error-dialog-title"&gt;ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼&lt;/span&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;div class="error-dialog-message"&gt;
+             {{ errorMessage }}
+           &lt;/div&gt;

+   &lt;/div&gt;
+ &lt;/template&gt;
+ 
+ &lt;script&gt;
+ export default {
+   name: 'AttendanceApplicationDialog',
+   props: {
+     visible: {
+       type: Boolean,
+       default: false
+     },
+     targetDate: {
+       type: String,
+       required: true
+     },
+     employeeId: {
+       type: String,
+       required: true
+     },
+     initialApplicationType: {
+       type: String,
+       default: null
+     }
+   },
+   data() {
+     return {
+       currentTab: 'menu',
+       activeApplicationTab: null,
+       loading: false,
+       showErrorDialog: false,
+       errorMessage: '',
+       
+       // ä¼‘æš‡ç¨®åˆ¥ãƒã‚¹ã‚¿
+       vacationTypes: [],
+       paidLeaveBalance: 0,
+       
+       // ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       vacationForm: {
+         vacationType: '',
+         startDate: '',
+         endDate: '',
+         reason: '',
+         contact: ''
+       },
+       
+       // ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       holidayWorkForm: {
+         startDate: '',
+         endDate: '',
+         reason: ''
+       },
+       
+       // æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       overtimeForm: {
+         startDate: '',
+         endDate: '',
+         hours: '',
+         reason: ''
+       },
+       
+       // æ—©æœå‹¤å‹™ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       earlyWorkForm: {
+         startDate: '',
+         endDate: '',
+         reason: ''
+       },
+       
+       // æŒ¯æ›¿ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       transferForm: {
+         fromDate: '',
+         toDate: '',
+         reason: ''
+       }
+     }
+   },
+   computed: {
+     formattedDate() {
+       if (!this.targetDate) return ''
+       const date = new Date(this.targetDate)
+       const year = date.getFullYear()
+       const month = date.getMonth() + 1
+       const day = date.getDate()
+       const dayNames = ['æ—¥', 'æœˆ', 'ç«', 'æ°´', 'æœ¨', 'é‡‘', 'åœŸ']
+       const dayOfWeek = dayNames[date.getDay()]
+       return &#96;${year}å¹´${month}æœˆ${day}æ—¥${dayOfWeek}æ›œæ—¥&#96;
+     },
+     currentDescription() {
+       if (this.currentTab === 'menu') {
+         return 'ç”³è«‹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚'
+       }
+       return ''
+     }
+   },
+   watch: {
+     visible(newVal) {
+       if (newVal) {
+         this.initialize()
+       }
+     }
+   },
+   methods: {
+     async initialize() {
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         // ä¼‘æš‡ç¨®åˆ¥ãƒã‚¹ã‚¿å–å¾—
+         await this.loadVacationTypes()
+         
+         // æœ‰çµ¦æ®‹æ—¥æ•°å–å¾—
+         await this.loadPaidLeaveBalance()
+         
+         // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã®åˆæœŸå€¤è¨­å®š
+         this.initializeForms()
+         
+         // åˆæœŸç”³è«‹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ãã®ã‚¿ãƒ–ã‚’é–‹ã
+         if (this.initialApplicationType) {
+           this.openApplicationTab(this.initialApplicationType)
+         } else {
+           this.currentTab = 'menu'
+           this.activeApplicationTab = null
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('åˆæœŸåŒ–ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('åˆæœŸåŒ–ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     initializeForms() {
+       // å„ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å¯¾è±¡æ—¥ä»˜ã§åˆæœŸåŒ–
+       this.vacationForm.startDate = this.targetDate
+       this.vacationForm.endDate = this.targetDate
+       this.holidayWorkForm.startDate = this.targetDate
+       this.holidayWorkForm.endDate = this.targetDate
+       this.overtimeForm.startDate = this.targetDate
+       this.overtimeForm.endDate = this.targetDate
+       this.earlyWorkForm.startDate = this.targetDate
+       this.earlyWorkForm.endDate = this.targetDate
+       this.transferForm.fromDate = this.targetDate
+       this.transferForm.toDate = this.targetDate
+     },
+     
+     async loadVacationTypes() {
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/master/vacation-types')
+         const data = await response.json()
+         if (data.success) {
+           this.vacationTypes = data.vacationTypes.map(type =&gt; ({
+             code: type.VACATION_TYPE_CODE,
+             name: type.VACATION_TYPE_NAME,
+             isPaid: type.IS_PAID
+           }))
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('ä¼‘æš‡ç¨®åˆ¥ãƒã‚¹ã‚¿å–å¾—ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async loadPaidLeaveBalance() {
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch(
+           &#96;http://localhost:3000/api/vacation/balance?employeeId=${this.employeeId}&amp;vacationTypeCode=PAID_LEAVE&#96;
+         )
+         const data = await response.json()
+         if (data.success) {
+           this.paidLeaveBalance = data.balance || 0
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æœ‰çµ¦æ®‹æ—¥æ•°å–å¾—ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+       }
+     },
+     
+     openApplicationTab(applicationType) {
+       // æ—¢å­˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ–ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã¦æ–°ã—ã„ã‚¿ãƒ–ã‚’é–‹ã
+       this.activeApplicationTab = applicationType
+       this.currentTab = applicationType
+     },
+     
+     closeApplicationTab() {
+       this.activeApplicationTab = null
+       this.currentTab = 'menu'
+     },
+     
+     switchToMenu() {
+       this.currentTab = 'menu'
+     },
+     
+     switchTab(tabName) {
+       this.currentTab = tabName
+     },
+     
+     getTabName(applicationType) {
+       const names = {
+         dailyConfirmation: 'æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®š',
+         vacation: 'ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹',
+         holidayWork: 'ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹',
+         overtime: 'æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹',
+         earlyWork: 'æ—©æœå‹¤å‹™ç”³è«‹',
+         transfer: 'æŒ¯æ›¿ç”³è«‹'
+       }
+       return names[applicationType] || ''
+     },
+     
+     onVacationTypeChange() {
+       // æœ‰çµ¦ä¼‘æš‡ãŒé¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸå ´åˆã®ã¿æ®‹æ—¥æ•°ã‚’å†å–å¾—
+       if (this.vacationForm.vacationType === 'PAID_LEAVE') {
+         this.loadPaidLeaveBalance()
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitDailyConfirmation() {
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/daily-confirmation', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             workDate: this.targetDate
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitVacationApplication() {
+       // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+       if (!this.vacationForm.vacationType) {
+         this.showError('ä¼‘æš‡ç¨®é¡ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.vacationForm.startDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.vacationForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (this.vacationForm.startDate &gt; this.vacationForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã¯çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚ˆã‚Šå‰ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/vacation/apply', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             vacationTypeCode: this.vacationForm.vacationType,
+             startDate: this.vacationForm.startDate,
+             endDate: this.vacationForm.endDate,
+             reason: this.vacationForm.reason,
+             contact: this.vacationForm.contact
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitHolidayWorkApplication() {
+       // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+       if (!this.holidayWorkForm.startDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.holidayWorkForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (this.holidayWorkForm.startDate &gt; this.holidayWorkForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã¯çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚ˆã‚Šå‰ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/holiday-work', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             startDate: this.holidayWorkForm.startDate,
+             endDate: this.holidayWorkForm.endDate,
+             reason: this.holidayWorkForm.reason
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitOvertimeApplication() {
+       // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+       if (!this.overtimeForm.startDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.overtimeForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (this.overtimeForm.startDate &gt; this.overtimeForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã¯çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚ˆã‚Šå‰ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.overtimeForm.hours) {
+         this.showError('æ®‹æ¥­æ™‚é–“ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       
+       this.loading = true

+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/overtime', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             startDate: this.overtimeForm.startDate,
+             endDate: this.overtimeForm.endDate,
+             overtimeHours: parseFloat(this.overtimeForm.hours),
+             reason: this.overtimeForm.reason
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },

+     async submitEarlyWorkApplication() {

+       }
+     },

+     async submitTransferApplication() {
+       // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+       if (!this.transferForm.fromDate) {
+         this.showError('æŒ¯æ›¿å…ƒæ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.transferForm.toDate) {
+         this.showError('æŒ¯æ›¿å…ˆæ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (this.transferForm.fromDate === this.transferForm.toDate) {
+         this.showError('æŒ¯æ›¿å…ƒæ—¥ã¨æŒ¯æ›¿å…ˆæ—¥ã¯ç•°ãªã‚‹æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')

+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'

+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             fromDate: this.transferForm.fromDate,
+             toDate: this.transferForm.toDate,

+         this.showError('æŒ¯æ›¿ç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {

+       }
+     },

+       &#96;INSERT INTO APPLICATION_HISTORY

+     async loadDailyAttendanceData() {
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch(
+           &#96;http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/daily?employeeId=${this.employeeId}&amp;workDate=${this.targetDate}&#96;
+         )
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success &amp;&amp; data.attendance) {
+           const attendance = data.attendance
+           
+           // å‡ºé€€ç¤¾æ™‚åˆ»ã‚’è¨­å®š
+           const clockIn = attendance.CLOCK_IN_TIME ? this.formatTime(attendance.CLOCK_IN_TIME) : '--:--'
+           const clockOut = attendance.CLOCK_OUT_TIME ? this.formatTime(attendance.CLOCK_OUT_TIME) : '--:--'
+           this.dailyConfirmationForm.clockInOut = &#96;${clockIn}-${clockOut}&#96;
+           
+           // ä¼‘æ†©æ™‚é–“ã‚’è¨­å®š
+           if (attendance.breakTimes &amp;&amp; attendance.breakTimes.length &gt; 0) {
+             this.dailyConfirmationForm.breakTime = attendance.breakTimes
+               .map(bt =&gt; &#96;${this.formatTime(bt.START_TIME)}-${this.formatTime(bt.END_TIME)}&#96;)
+               .join(', ')
+           } else {
+             this.dailyConfirmationForm.breakTime = '--:-- - --:--'
+           }
+           
+           // ç·åŠ´åƒæ™‚é–“ã‚’è¨­å®š
+           if (attendance.CLOCK_IN_TIME &amp;&amp; attendance.CLOCK_OUT_TIME) {
+             const clockInDate = new Date(attendance.CLOCK_IN_TIME)
+             const clockOutDate = new Date(attendance.CLOCK_OUT_TIME)
+             const totalMinutes = Math.floor((clockOutDate - clockInDate) / 1000 / 60)
+             this.dailyConfirmationForm.totalWorkHours = this.formatHoursMinutes(totalMinutes)
+           } else {
+             this.dailyConfirmationForm.totalWorkHours = '0:00'
+           }
+           
+           // å®ŸåŠ´åƒæ™‚é–“ã‚’è¨­å®š
+           this.dailyConfirmationForm.actualWorkHours = this.formatHoursMinutes(Math.floor((attendance.ACTUAL_WORK_HOURS || 0) * 60))
+           
+           // å‚™è€ƒã‚’è¨­å®š
+           this.dailyConfirmationForm.remark = attendance.REMARK_TEXT || ''
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ—¥æ¬¡å‹¤æ€ ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿å–å¾—ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('æ—¥æ¬¡å‹¤æ€ ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®å–å¾—ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚')
+       }
+     },
+     
+     formatTime(dateTimeString) {
+       if (!dateTimeString) return '--:--'
+       const date = new Date(dateTimeString)
+       const hours = String(date.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
+       const minutes = String(date.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')
+       return &#96;${hours}:${minutes}&#96;
+     },
+     
+     formatHoursMinutes(totalMinutes) {
+       const hours = Math.floor(totalMinutes / 60)
+       const minutes = totalMinutes % 60
+       return &#96;${hours}:${String(minutes).padStart(2, '0')}&#96;
+     },

+             &gt;&lt;/textarea&gt;

+             &lt;button class="submit-button" @click="submitTransferApplication"&gt;æ‰¿èªç”³è«‹&lt;/button&gt;
+             &lt;button class="cancel-button" @click="closeApplicationTab"&gt;ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«&lt;/button&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+       
+       &lt;!-- ä¸‹éƒ¨æ“ä½œã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ --&gt;
+       &lt;div class="dialog-footer"&gt;
+         &lt;a href="#" @click.prevent="closeDialog" class="close-link"&gt;é–‰ã˜ã‚‹&lt;/a&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+       
+       &lt;!-- ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°è¡¨ç¤º --&gt;
+       &lt;div v-if="loading" class="loading-overlay"&gt;
+         &lt;div class="loading-spinner"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;p&gt;å‡¦ç†ä¸­...&lt;/p&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+       
+       &lt;!-- ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚° --&gt;
+       &lt;div v-if="showErrorDialog" class="error-dialog-overlay" @click.self="closeErrorDialog"&gt;
+         &lt;div class="error-dialog-container"&gt;
+           &lt;div class="error-dialog-header"&gt;
+             &lt;span class="error-dialog-title"&gt;ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼&lt;/span&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;div class="error-dialog-message"&gt;
+             {{ errorMessage }}
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;button class="error-dialog-ok-button" @click="closeErrorDialog"&gt;OK&lt;/button&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+   &lt;/div&gt;
+ &lt;/template&gt;
+ 
+ &lt;script&gt;
+ export default {
+   name: 'AttendanceApplicationDialog',
+   props: {
+     visible: {
+       type: Boolean,
+       default: false
+     },
+     targetDate: {
+       type: String,
+       required: true
+     },
+     employeeId: {
+       type: String,
+       required: true
+     },
+     initialApplicationType: {
+       type: String,
+       default: null
+     }
+   },
+   data() {
+     return {
+       currentTab: 'menu',
+       activeApplicationTab: null,
+       loading: false,
+       showErrorDialog: false,
+       errorMessage: '',
+       
+       // ä¼‘æš‡ç¨®åˆ¥ãƒã‚¹ã‚¿
+       vacationTypes: [],
+       paidLeaveBalance: 0,
+       
+       // æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       dailyConfirmationForm: {
+         clockInOut: '',
+         breakTime: '',
+         totalWorkHours: '',
+         actualWorkHours: '',
+         remark: ''
+       },
+       
+       // ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       vacationForm: {
+         vacationType: '',
+         startDate: '',
+         endDate: '',
+         reason: '',
+         contact: ''
+       },
+       
+       // ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       holidayWorkForm: {
+         startDate: '',
+         endDate: '',
+         reason: ''
+       },
+       
+       // æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       overtimeForm: {
+         startDate: '',
+         endDate: '',
+         hours: '',
+         reason: ''
+       },
+       
+       // æ—©æœå‹¤å‹™ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       earlyWorkForm: {
+         startDate: '',
+         endDate: '',
+         reason: ''
+       },
+       
+       // æŒ¯æ›¿ç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ 
+       transferForm: {
+         fromDate: '',
+         toDate: '',
+         reason: ''
+       }
+     }
+   },
+   computed: {
+     formattedDate() {
+       if (!this.targetDate) return ''
+       const date = new Date(this.targetDate)
+       const year = date.getFullYear()
+       const month = date.getMonth() + 1
+       const day = date.getDate()
+       const dayNames = ['æ—¥', 'æœˆ', 'ç«', 'æ°´', 'æœ¨', 'é‡‘', 'åœŸ']
+       const dayOfWeek = dayNames[date.getDay()]
+       return &#96;${year}å¹´${month}æœˆ${day}æ—¥${dayOfWeek}æ›œæ—¥&#96;
+     },
+     currentDescription() {
+       if (this.currentTab === 'menu') {
+         return 'ç”³è«‹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚'
+       }
+       return ''
+     }
+   },
+   watch: {
+     visible(newVal) {
+       if (newVal) {
+         this.initialize()
+       }
+     }
+   },
+   methods: {
+     async initialize() {
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         // ä¼‘æš‡ç¨®åˆ¥ãƒã‚¹ã‚¿å–å¾—
+         await this.loadVacationTypes()
+         
+         // æœ‰çµ¦æ®‹æ—¥æ•°å–å¾—
+         await this.loadPaidLeaveBalance()
+         
+         // ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã®åˆæœŸå€¤è¨­å®š
+         this.initializeForms()
+         
+         // åˆæœŸç”³è«‹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ãã®ã‚¿ãƒ–ã‚’é–‹ã
+         if (this.initialApplicationType) {
+           this.openApplicationTab(this.initialApplicationType)
+         } else {
+           this.currentTab = 'menu'
+           this.activeApplicationTab = null
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('åˆæœŸåŒ–ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('åˆæœŸåŒ–ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     initializeForms() {
+       // æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã®åˆæœŸåŒ–
+       this.dailyConfirmationForm = {
+         clockInOut: '',
+         breakTime: '',
+         totalWorkHours: '',
+         actualWorkHours: '',
+         remark: ''
+       }
+       
+       // å„ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å¯¾è±¡æ—¥ä»˜ã§åˆæœŸåŒ–
+       this.vacationForm.startDate = this.targetDate
+       this.vacationForm.endDate = this.targetDate
+       this.holidayWorkForm.startDate = this.targetDate
+       this.holidayWorkForm.endDate = this.targetDate
+       this.overtimeForm.startDate = this.targetDate
+       this.overtimeForm.endDate = this.targetDate
+       this.earlyWorkForm.startDate = this.targetDate
+       this.earlyWorkForm.endDate = this.targetDate
+       this.transferForm.fromDate = this.targetDate
+       this.transferForm.toDate = this.targetDate
+     },
+     
+     async loadVacationTypes() {
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/master/vacation-types')
+         const data = await response.json()
+         if (data.success) {
+           this.vacationTypes = data.vacationTypes.map(type =&gt; ({
+             code: type.VACATION_TYPE_CODE,
+             name: type.VACATION_TYPE_NAME,
+             isPaid: type.IS_PAID
+           }))
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('ä¼‘æš‡ç¨®åˆ¥ãƒã‚¹ã‚¿å–å¾—ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async loadPaidLeaveBalance() {
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch(
+           &#96;http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/vacation/balance?employeeId=${this.employeeId}&amp;vacationTypeCode=PAID_LEAVE&#96;
+         )
+         const data = await response.json()
+         if (data.success) {
+           this.paidLeaveBalance = data.balance || 0
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æœ‰çµ¦æ®‹æ—¥æ•°å–å¾—ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async loadDailyAttendanceData() {
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch(
+           &#96;http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/daily?employeeId=${this.employeeId}&amp;workDate=${this.targetDate}&#96;
+         )
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success &amp;&amp; data.attendance) {
+           const attendance = data.attendance
+           
+           // å‡ºé€€ç¤¾æ™‚åˆ»ã‚’è¨­å®š
+           const clockIn = attendance.CLOCK_IN_TIME ? this.formatTime(attendance.CLOCK_IN_TIME) : '--:--'
+           const clockOut = attendance.CLOCK_OUT_TIME ? this.formatTime(attendance.CLOCK_OUT_TIME) : '--:--'
+           this.dailyConfirmationForm.clockInOut = &#96;${clockIn}-${clockOut}&#96;
+           
+           // ä¼‘æ†©æ™‚é–“ã‚’è¨­å®š
+           if (attendance.breakTimes &amp;&amp; attendance.breakTimes.length &gt; 0) {
+             this.dailyConfirmationForm.breakTime = attendance.breakTimes
+               .map(bt =&gt; &#96;${this.formatTime(bt.START_TIME)}-${this.formatTime(bt.END_TIME)}&#96;)
+               .join(', ')
+           } else {
+             this.dailyConfirmationForm.breakTime = '--:-- - --:--'
+           }
+           
+           // ç·åŠ´åƒæ™‚é–“ã‚’è¨­å®š
+           if (attendance.CLOCK_IN_TIME &amp;&amp; attendance.CLOCK_OUT_TIME) {
+             const clockInDate = new Date(attendance.CLOCK_IN_TIME)
+             const clockOutDate = new Date(attendance.CLOCK_OUT_TIME)
+             const totalMinutes = Math.floor((clockOutDate - clockInDate) / 1000 / 60)
+             this.dailyConfirmationForm.totalWorkHours = this.formatHoursMinutes(totalMinutes)
+           } else {
+             this.dailyConfirmationForm.totalWorkHours = '0:00'
+           }
+           
+           // å®ŸåŠ´åƒæ™‚é–“ã‚’è¨­å®š
+           this.dailyConfirmationForm.actualWorkHours = this.formatHoursMinutes(Math.floor((attendance.ACTUAL_WORK_HOURS || 0) * 60))
+           
+           // å‚™è€ƒã‚’è¨­å®š
+           this.dailyConfirmationForm.remark = attendance.REMARK_TEXT || ''
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ—¥æ¬¡å‹¤æ€ ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿å–å¾—ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('æ—¥æ¬¡å‹¤æ€ ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®å–å¾—ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚')
+       }
+     },
+     
+     formatTime(dateTimeString) {
+       if (!dateTimeString) return '--:--'
+       const date = new Date(dateTimeString)
+       const hours = String(date.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
+       const minutes = String(date.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')
+       return &#96;${hours}:${minutes}&#96;
+     },
+     
+     formatHoursMinutes(totalMinutes) {
+       const hours = Math.floor(totalMinutes / 60)
+       const minutes = totalMinutes % 60
+       return &#96;${hours}:${String(minutes).padStart(2, '0')}&#96;
+     },
+     
+     async openApplicationTab(applicationType) {
+       // æ—¢å­˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ–ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã¦æ–°ã—ã„ã‚¿ãƒ–ã‚’é–‹ã
+       this.activeApplicationTab = applicationType
+       this.currentTab = applicationType
+       
+       // æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šã‚¿ãƒ–ã‚’é–‹ã„ãŸå ´åˆã¯å‹¤æ€ ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å–å¾—
+       if (applicationType === 'dailyConfirmation') {
+         await this.loadDailyAttendanceData()
+       }
+     },
+     
+     closeApplicationTab() {
+       this.activeApplicationTab = null
+       this.currentTab = 'menu'
+     },
+     
+     switchToMenu() {
+       this.currentTab = 'menu'
+     },
+     
+     switchTab(tabName) {
+       this.currentTab = tabName
+     },
+     
+     getTabName(applicationType) {
+       const names = {
+         dailyConfirmation: 'æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®š',
+         vacation: 'ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹',
+         holidayWork: 'ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹',
+         overtime: 'æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹',
+         earlyWork: 'æ—©æœå‹¤å‹™ç”³è«‹',
+         transfer: 'æŒ¯æ›¿ç”³è«‹'
+       }
+       return names[applicationType] || ''
+     },
+     
+     onVacationTypeChange() {
+       // æœ‰çµ¦ä¼‘æš‡ãŒé¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸå ´åˆã®ã¿æ®‹æ—¥æ•°ã‚’å†å–å¾—
+       if (this.vacationForm.vacationType === 'PAID_LEAVE') {
+         this.loadPaidLeaveBalance()
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitDailyConfirmation() {
+       // ã¾ãšå‚™è€ƒã‚’ä¿å­˜
+       if (this.dailyConfirmationForm.remark) {
+         await this.saveRemark()
+       }
+       
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/daily-confirmation', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             workDate: this.targetDate
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('æ—¥æ¬¡ç¢ºå®šç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async saveRemark() {
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/record', {
+           method: 'PUT',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             workDate: this.targetDate,
+             remarkText: this.dailyConfirmationForm.remark
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         if (!data.success) {
+           console.error('å‚™è€ƒä¿å­˜ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', data.message)
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('å‚™è€ƒä¿å­˜ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitVacationApplication() {
+       // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+       if (!this.vacationForm.vacationType) {
+         this.showError('ä¼‘æš‡ç¨®é¡ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.vacationForm.startDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.vacationForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (this.vacationForm.startDate &gt; this.vacationForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã¯çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚ˆã‚Šå‰ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/vacation/apply', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             vacationTypeCode: this.vacationForm.vacationType,
+             startDate: this.vacationForm.startDate,
+             endDate: this.vacationForm.endDate,
+             reason: this.vacationForm.reason,
+             contact: this.vacationForm.contact
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('ä¼‘æš‡ç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitHolidayWorkApplication() {
+       // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+       if (!this.holidayWorkForm.startDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.holidayWorkForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (this.holidayWorkForm.startDate &gt; this.holidayWorkForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã¯çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚ˆã‚Šå‰ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/holiday-work', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             startDate: this.holidayWorkForm.startDate,
+             endDate: this.holidayWorkForm.endDate,
+             reason: this.holidayWorkForm.reason
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('ä¼‘æ—¥å‡ºå‹¤ç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitOvertimeApplication() {
+       // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+       if (!this.overtimeForm.startDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.overtimeForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (this.overtimeForm.startDate &gt; this.overtimeForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã¯çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚ˆã‚Šå‰ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.overtimeForm.hours) {
+         this.showError('æ®‹æ¥­æ™‚é–“ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/overtime', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             startDate: this.overtimeForm.startDate,
+             endDate: this.overtimeForm.endDate,
+             overtimeHours: parseFloat(this.overtimeForm.hours),
+             reason: this.overtimeForm.reason
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('æ®‹æ¥­ç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitEarlyWorkApplication() {
+       // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+       if (!this.earlyWorkForm.startDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.earlyWorkForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (this.earlyWorkForm.startDate &gt; this.earlyWorkForm.endDate) {
+         this.showError('é–‹å§‹æ—¥ã¯çµ‚äº†æ—¥ã‚ˆã‚Šå‰ã®æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/early-work', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             startDate: this.earlyWorkForm.startDate,
+             endDate: this.earlyWorkForm.endDate,
+             reason: this.earlyWorkForm.reason
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('æ—©æœå‹¤å‹™ç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'æ—©æœå‹¤å‹™ç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ—©æœå‹¤å‹™ç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('æ—©æœå‹¤å‹™ç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     async submitTransferApplication() {
+       // ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
+       if (!this.transferForm.fromDate) {
+         this.showError('æŒ¯æ›¿å…ƒæ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (!this.transferForm.toDate) {
+         this.showError('æŒ¯æ›¿å…ˆæ—¥ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       if (this.transferForm.fromDate === this.transferForm.toDate) {
+         this.showError('æŒ¯æ›¿å…ƒæ—¥ã¨æŒ¯æ›¿å…ˆæ—¥ã¯ç•°ãªã‚‹æ—¥ä»˜ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚')
+         return
+       }
+       
+       this.loading = true
+       try {
+         const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/attendance/transfer', {
+           method: 'POST',
+           headers: {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+           },
+           body: JSON.stringify({
+             employeeId: this.employeeId,
+             fromDate: this.transferForm.fromDate,
+             toDate: this.transferForm.toDate,
+             reason: this.transferForm.reason
+           })
+         })
+         
+         const data = await response.json()
+         
+         if (data.success) {
+           alert('æŒ¯æ›¿ç”³è«‹ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+           this.$emit('application-submitted')
+           this.closeDialog()
+         } else {
+           this.showError(data.message || 'æŒ¯æ›¿ç”³è«‹ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æŒ¯æ›¿ç”³è«‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼:', error)
+         this.showError('æŒ¯æ›¿ç”³è«‹ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ')
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+     
+     showError(message) {
+       this.errorMessage = message
+       this.showErrorDialog = true
+     },
+     
+     closeErrorDialog() {
+       this.showErrorDialog = false
+       this.errorMessage = ''
+     },
+     
+     closeDialog() {
+       this.$emit('close')
+     }
+   }
+ }
